Articles.Content: I recently discovered the mods page, but the download seems to be removed. If anyone still has a copy could you please share it? Either he removed it or im blind as a bat

This thread is old as hell, but it was on my search results while I was on the same quest so I thought it is a good idea to publish the solution I found.

Try Archive.org. I found them there: https://archive.org/details/kspckanmods?and[]=stryker&sin=

There's also something on CurseForge: https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/strykers-aerospace-restored-cockpits/files

Everything terribly outdated, but at least the license allows a revival.
